channel.title: Help me
channel.description: dont call me a noob cuz there no tut on how to make a server int he tut section......!!! how do i make a server? get the no ip and log onto it and edit stuff to make it cool..and make more items like a dragon defender and godswords thanks!

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

Ummmm dude its not the simple…
its takes hours and hours of pain stacking work,
w8 do you even know java?
Java is what servers are compiled out of…
And if you do not know java, no server
so i recommend go get a book or if you jest pick it up like i did go for it.

Whats i did is:
(1) look at a strip of code
(2) figure out its meaning
do that and sooner or later you can start taking it apart and peacing it together and sooner or l8r you well have a server!
Thats how i did it and look at me now i am a code junky!
well i guess it was easy for me because i am a computer geek and learn really fast but…

GO FOR IT DUDE!

Read full topic
